A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Whilst The Force Awakens felt like a reimagined of A New Hope\, this feels like its own movie. \n\nIm surprised by the low user rating. I loved it. Enough spectacular aerial battles\, strong female characters (take your daughters!)\, the mystical magic of the Force\, a brilliant lightsaber fight and it was funny. Its Star Wars so the dialogue is never going to be great and the acting wont win awards. But it was brilliant. Go and see it and make your own mind up
